  • Quick-Start Guide

    UFO Headpiece

    A wearable, animated LED headpiece built for the McMinnville UFO Festival.

    Overview

    This project combines CircuitPython, Adafruit Feather RP2040, a NeoPixel Ring, and 3D-printed parts.
